Title: Feeling the Heat
Plot: During the latest heat wave, Grissom and Catherine investigate a baby locked in a car. Warrick investigates a man dead of an apparent heat stroke in his house. Nick and Sarah investigate when a woman's body is found floating in a lake.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence,sexual themes and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Arye Gross, Stacy Edwards, Chris Mulkey, Carlos Jacott, Erik Jensen, Rick Ravanello, Cam Gigandet, Jacy Gross, Paul Rae, Adrienne Smith, Ryan Starr, James Leo Ryan, Chris Mulkey
